page.title: 08A Family Sunday
page.content: I am writing about what my family does on Sunday.In the morning my mum puts the meat into the oven,and then she goes back to bed.We get up and have our cornflakes and toast.Then we get washed and dressed.After that we go out and play,we sometimes play tig or we play 40,40.Sometimes we play on the computer for an hour or two.At 2.00 we have dinner.We have pork,roast potatoes, peas,yorkshire pudding and gravy.At about 3.30 we have pudding.After that we either watch television or go for a walk.My favourite t.v. programme on a Sunday is Murder She Wrote.Because it is a Sunday my brothers go to bed at 7.30 and my sister and I go at 8.45. by Claire Griffiths
